properties.name: collection
properties.description: Collection over which to iterate, drives row data

properties.name: row
properties.description: Customized row element, (view for each model)

properties.name: empty
properties.description: Empty message element to display in the case that the list is empty.

properties.name: loader
properties.description: Loader element to display when content is being fetched from the server

properties.name: selectable
properties.description: If false, list items will not be selectable with keyboard (default true)

properties.name: onSelect
properties.description: Called with selected row model on keyboard enter
